original_text: And they set the priests in their divisions and the Levites in their divisions, for the service of God at Jerusalem, as it is written in the Book of Moses.
korean_text: 제사장을 그 분반대로, 레위 사람을 그 순차대로 세워 예루살렘에서 하나님을 섬기게 하되 모세의 책에 기록된 대로 하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: And they set the priests in their divisions
and the Levites in their divisions
for the service of God at Jerusalem
as it is written in the Book of Moses
